description.value:
Frequency once per hour

Your life force can fuel the stuff of miracles. You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Drained]{Drained 1} or increase the value of your drained condition by 1 if you already have the drained condition. Before the end of your next turn, if you Cast a Spell of 4th rank or lower, you don't expend the spell's slot when you cast it, or if you cast a focus spell, it does not cost a Focus Point. The spell loses whatever tradition trait it would normally have and gains the divine trait.
